head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths THOMPSON, ALBERT C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths THOMPSON, ALBERT C.

block.p: THOMPSON-Albert C. Of Huntington Station, on August 10, 2000. Loving husband of Barbara (nee McLaughlin). Beloved father of Myles and Doreen. Cherished father-in-law of Liana. Dear brother of Arthur C. and Robert C. Associated with Custom Travel in Amityville. Reposing Saturday 7-9 PM and Sunday 2-5 and 7-9 PM at M. A. Connell Funeral Home Inc., 934 New York Ave, Huntington. Mass of Christian Burial Monday 9:45 AM at St. Elizabeth's Church, Melville. Interment at Long Island National Cemetery, Pinelawn. Donations to Good Samaritan Hospice, 655 Deer Park Ave., Babylon, NY 11702 or to Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center, 1275 York Ave., New York, New York 10131-0112 are appreciated.
